comments.author: Wajahat Malik
comments.content:
Dear KM Ali

For a while i have been planning a rafting trip on river indus. I would love to raft on indus all the way to karachi. please let me know what you have in mind. I live in islamabad and make adventure/travel films. Please email me.

comments.author: 4x4 South Africa
comments.content: wow it sounds like it was an awesome adventure

comments.author: Jamie
comments.content:
Hello,

My husband and I want to raft the Indus! We are currently graduate students at Harvard University, but rafting the entire Indus is one of our life goals:). We’d love to hear more of your plans…and, who knows, perhaps we can join up some day!

comments.author: ahmed Jaudet Bilal
comments.content:
I wouldl like to have the contact of people who did this trip.

Thank you

Bilal

comments.author: Naseem Zafar Iqbal
comments.content:
Dear Ali,

Acts of Courage have decades long impact on lives of individuals, organizations and societies. You inspired another group to take on Ravi, Chenab and Indus Simultaneously. The RICE ‘85. You will be glad to know that this River Expedition has in 25 years now transformed into a “Leadership Adventure Expedition”. The hottest Leadership Development Program for Corporate Pakistan. Hope you remember me. Regards.

Those interested in such undertakings can benefit from our experience

comments.author: KM Ali
comments.content: Hi Ahmed, if you still see this,  my e-mail is khwaja_m_ali@hotmail.com. Feel free to contact me anytime and we can think of some adventure!

comments.author: KM Ali
comments.content: Hi Nasim, certainly remember you. I am delighted to see that such adventures are transforming into leadership development projects. FYI,  We are planning a Silk Road Expedition in June/July 2016 from Shanghai to Gwadar. Want to join in? My contact is khwaja_m_ali@hotmail.com

comments.author: KM Ali
comments.content: Hi Jamie, it might be too late, did you do the Indus? If you want I can send you details to enable planning. khwaja_m_ali@hotmail.com

comments.author: Faheem
comments.content: I'm not getting much information on the river boating above turbela upto the last extermity of shangla district where the river is navigable and safe and the current is not that fast... Call me if anyone have any such experience and gear to vonture it.. +923028190327
